Totoview
========

.. image:: _static/logo.ico
   :width: 200 px
   :align: center

TOTOVIEW is a GUI. It is the wrapper of all `TOTO`_â€™s function.
TOTOVIEW enable the user to have an interactive display of the timeseries and processing timesteps.

Python GUI for processing timeseries
------------------------------------
